name: Collins Mbathi

services.title: Automation Testing
services.description: I test software and other technological products to ensure they meet stringent requirements.

services.title: Development
services.description: In charge of creating and improving software and applications. This includes research, design, and development of software. Analysts and computer engineers working together to achieve the proposed software application performance

services.title: Web Design
services.description: Design, which is sometimes misunderstood as the superficial process of creating, executing, or constructing the appearance of a product, actually entails much more. It is a multidisciplinary task that includes market research, concept design, and technological research.

aboutpara:
,Hello there! My name is Collins Mbathi, and I work as a software engineer, technical writer, and community advocate. I live in Nairobi.

 I have two years of experience writing JavaScript code, and I've created personal projects as well as excellent client websites, some of which are used by the community to solve everyday problems. I also write articles in which I discuss how to develop applications, write tests, integrate with CircleCI and other CI/CD platforms, and document.


As a community supporter, I give talks and introduce newcomers to the world of technology, and I am a core leader at Google Developers Student Club.

Here are a few technologies I've recently worked with:

Figma,
Sanity.io,
React JS,
Next JS,
Node JS,
Express JS,
MongoDB,
Mysql,
Git,
 GitHub,
 Docker,
AWS Heroku,
Digital Ocean,

I'm actively looking for a new job as a Software Engineer and would like to be notified of any new openings.
